name: Baland
description:
You decided to build a nice little home on a 100% stable plank. Mhm that's the story.

When you finish your small abide, it starts to get dark. You hear grumbling/fire/squishing/crumbling/slithering/othernoises. Enemies.

You're gonna have to defend your house for as long as possible.

WASD to move

Mouse to aim/shoot
